archiefmat.titel: Documenten met betrekking tot het eigendom en de verkoop van onroerend goed, waaronder enkele plantages en panden in Otrobanda
archiefmat.titel_eng: Documents regarding the ownership and sale of real estate, including a number of plantations and houses in Otrobanda
archiefmat.scope: Documents pertaining to the purchase and sale of real estate: plantations Oud St. Marie, Meiberg and part of Bullenbaai (Hermanus), 1687-1924; Groot St. Michel, 1728-1861; Malpais, alias Daniel, 1732-1906; several pieces of land and a number of buildings in Otrobanda, 1750-1919
